title: Update failed , newly downloaded client .
body: So i reinstalled my Windows , i tried running the old client , it feedbacks an Update Failed error . I reinstalled League client too , same problem . I jusst wanna play URF :(

replies.body: You might be having a connection problem failing to reach the patching servers.  Try out each step in our [connection issues](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752664-Troubleshooting-Connection-Issues) guide to make sure your network is in order.  Let me know if you have any questions!
It just fixed itself ðŸ˜Š thank you anyway . Have a nice day .
